sentences.english: Dragon pattern is the main manifestation of ornamentations on bronze in the period of Shang to early western Zhou.
sentences.chinese: 龍紋是商周時期青銅器裝飾藝術的一大主題。

sentences.english: However, the Prototype of Dragon pattern cannot be found in real world.
sentences.chinese: 龍紋是真正的“觀念的形式”。

sentences.english: Dragon-pattern is the excellent cultural aesthetic heritage.
sentences.chinese: 龍紋圖案是中華民族優秀的文化藝術遺產。

sentences.english: Therefore, early used as a dragon design on the symbol of the spirit of our nation.
sentences.chinese: 故而，很早龍紋就成爲我們中華民族精神的象徵。

sentences.english: Guardian of a vampire's nest; dragonencapsulated in a polished black enamel.
sentences.chinese: 吸血鬼巢穴的守護者，黑色琺琅烤漆龍紋。

sentences.english: Shang dynasty is the golden period for the development of dragon patterns on bronze.
sentences.chinese: 殷商是青銅器龍紋發展的黃金時期。

sentences.english: This is enough to prove that the Dragon disc, which is when the court with porcelain.
sentences.chinese: 而此盤有龍紋，足以證明該器當爲宮廷用瓷。

definition: Yunlong district of Xuzhou city 徐州市[Xu2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu/Yunlong county in Dali Bai autonomous prefecture 大理白族自治州[Da4 li3 Bai2 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Yunnan
(of sb or sth) whole or entire body
eye-opening ceremony for a religious idol (Buddhism)/to consecrate/to bless/transparent/translucent/haircut/shaving the head or face (humorous)/a method of decoration/first light (astronomy)
kesi or k’o-ssu, Chinese silk tapestry woven in a pictorial design
bronze implement/refers to ancient bronze artifacts, from c. 2,000 BC
